C++ object-oriented wrapper library for raylib.

17 namespace raylib {
18  class Color : public ::Color {
19  public:
20  Color() {
21  r = 0;
22  g = 0;
23  b = 0;
24  a = 255;
25  }
26  Color(::Color color) {
27  r = color.r;
28  g = color.g;
29  b = color.b;
30  a = color.a;
31  }
32  Color(unsigned char red, unsigned char green, unsigned char blue, unsigned char alpha = 255) {
33  r = red;
34  g = green;
35  b = blue;
36  a = alpha;
37  };
38  Color(::Vector3 hsv) {
39  set(::ColorFromHSV(hsv.x, hsv.y, hsv.z));
40  };
41  static Color FromHSV(float hue, float saturation, float value) {
42  ::Color color = ::ColorFromHSV(hue, saturation, value);
43  return color;
44  };
45  Color(int hexValue) {
46  set(::GetColor(hexValue));
47  };
48  Color(Vector4 normalized) {
49  set(::ColorFromNormalized(normalized));
50  }

104  return *this;

113  ::ClearBackground(*this);
114  return *this;
115  }

118  ::DrawPixel(x, y, *this);
119  return *this;
120  }

128  ::DrawLine(startPosX, startPosY, endPosX, endPosY, *this);
129  return *this;
130  }

132  ::DrawLineV(startPos, endPos, *this);
133  return *this;
134  }

136  ::DrawLineEx(startPos, endPos, thick, *this);
137  return *this;
138  }

140  ::DrawLineBezier(startPos, endPos, thick, *this);
141  return *this;
142  }

148  inline Color& DrawText(const std::string& text, int posX, int posY, int fontSize) {
149  ::DrawText(text.c_str(), posX, posY, fontSize, *this);
150  return *this;
151  }
152  inline Color& DrawText(::Font font, const std::string& text, ::Vector2 position, float fontSize, float spacing) {
153  ::DrawTextEx(font, text.c_str(), position, fontSize, spacing, *this);
154  return *this;
155  }

158  ::DrawTextRec(font, text.c_str(), rec, fontSize, spacing, wordWrap, *this);
159  return *this;
